alert.note: Alert for Cullman (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 9:31PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cullman County through 1015 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cullman to near Smith Dam. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cullman, Hanceville, Good Hope, Dodge City, Baldwin, Vinemont, Baileyton, West Point, Colony, and Phelan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
